original: Ideforss, Hjalmar Emanuel, rektor, Göteborg, f. 30/1/91 i V. Sallerup, Malmöh. k G. 19 ni. Margareta HaM-fberg. Biarn: Kerstin f. 21. — Stud:-ex. 10, fil. kand. 11, fil. mag. 14, fil. lic. 24, fik dr 28, provår 18, allt i Lund. Doc. i sv. språket v. Lunds univ. 28, vik. prof. v. Gbgs liögsk. 31. Stud:-res. t. Norge, Danm., Tyskl. o. Ös-terr. Vik. adj. i Strömstad 15, e. lär. i Halmstad 15, vik. ämneslär. i Höör 16, åter i Halmstad 16-17, ord. lär. i Falkenberg 17, e. o. lektor v. Lunds folkskrsem. 19-20, adj. v. Malmö goss-lärov. 20, lektor i modersm. o. tyska v. Hvitfeldtska h. a. 1. i Gbg sed. 28, rektor v. Borås h. a. 1. 31, v. Major-nas h. a. 1. i Gbg sed. 39. Tf. und:-visn:råd 317-38, 39 samt somr. 39-47. Led. av stadsfullm. i Borås 36-38. Skr.: De primära interjektionerna i nysvenskan I (28), Vårt modersmåls liv o. utveckl. (28), I språkets utmärker (30), Rättstavn ifrågan som prakt. o. teor. problem (31), De primära lockorden i nysvenskan (31), art. o. rec. i tidn. o. tidskr. RNO.
translated: Ideforss, Hjalmar Emanuel, principal, Gothenburg, born on January 30, 1891, in V. Sallerup, Malmöhus County. Married to Margareta Hambraeus in 1919. Children: Kerstin, born in 1921. He obtained his high school diploma in 1910, B.A. in 1911, M.A. in 1914, Ph.Lic. in 1924, Doctorate in Philosophy in 1928, and practical year in 1918, all from Lund University. He became a docent in Swedish language at Lund University in 1928 and acting professor at the University of Gothenburg in 1931. He studied in Norway, Denmark, Germany, and Austria. He worked as an assistant teacher in Strömstad in 1915, a teacher in Halmstad in 1915, a substitute subject teacher in Höör in 1916, returned to Halmstad in 1916-1917, an ordinary teacher in Falkenberg in 1917, an extra professor at Lund's folk school from 1919-1920, an assistant teacher at Malmö Boys' School in 1920, a teacher of mother tongue and German at Hvitfeldtska High School in Gothenburg from 1928, a principal at Borås High School from 1931, and a principal at Majornas High School in Gothenburg since 1939. He served as a temporary education counselor in 1937-1938 and 1939 and during the summer of 1939-1947. He was also a member of the city council in Borås from 1936-1938. He published numerous articles and reviews in newspapers and magazines, including De primära interjektionerna i nysvenskan I (28), Vårt modersmåls liv o. utveckl. (28), I språkets utmärker (30), Rättstavn ifrågan som prakt. o. teor. problem (31), De primära lockorden i nysvenskan (31).
